articles.title: Trump slams Kennedys in wake of JFK’s granddaughter’s death
articles.description:
In a series of posts, Trump shared screenshots of his supporters questioning the Kennedys’ commitment to the arts and accusing them of “rooting for America and Trump to fail.” 

The post Trump slams Kennedys in wake of JFK’s granddaughter’s death appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: Trump slams Kennedys in wake of JFK’s granddaughte
